## Install

``` sh
pip install exex
```

``` python
C2 = Gas("C2")
```

``` python
O2 = Gas("O2")
```

``` python
CO2 = Gas("CO2")
```

``` python
r = Reaction(reactants=[C2, O2], products=[CO2])
```

``` python
r.formula
```

    '1C₂ + 1O₂ --> 1C₁O₂'

``` python
r.balance()
```

``` python
r.formula
```

    '1C₂ + 2O₂ --> 2C₁O₂'
